There are probably people who take every business card they receive and either pile them up or lose them before they get a chance to save the contents. This app allows the user to store all of their business cards in an organized, user-friendly way and then stores them alphabetically (in the app) to retrieve at any time.
The basics of the app are pretty straightforward. You open the program and either search for a contact or add a new one. Our scanning technology and ability to accurately categorize the cellular and fax numbers correctly is what sets us apart from competitors.
